item.description:
对于一些成员的违规行为，该组织不能责怪任何人，只能怪自己。【原文：

The group can’t blame anyone but itself for some members’ noncompliance.   

】

item.title: 津巴布韦货币震荡让央行官员初尝混乱滋味
item.description:
约翰-穆沙亚万胡（John Mushayavanhu ）正在应对曾经备受赞誉的ZiG公司的衰落。【原文：

John Mushayavanhu is dealing with the fallout as the once-hailed ZiG tumbles.

】

item.title: 在 "黑天鹅巡游 "中，威兹航空提议为首席执行官发放奖金
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司（Wizz Air Holdings Plc）计划为其首席执行官设立一个新的奖金方案，以奖励他在这家低成本航空公司面临地缘政治挑战和数十架飞机因发动机问题停飞的情况下对其进行的指导。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc plans to create a new bonus package for its chief executive officer, rewarding him for steering the low-cost carrier at a time when it is struggling through geopolitical challenges and has dozens of its aircraft grounded due to engine issues.】

item.title: 瑞士央行利率悬念将成为托马斯-乔丹的告别之作
item.description: 托马斯-乔丹（Thomas Jordan）作为瑞士国家银行行长的最后一次利率决定充满悬念，可能会让投资者大吃一惊—；就像他任职期间的其他关键时刻一样。【原文：Thomas Jordan’s final interest-rate decision as Swiss National Bank president is laden with suspense and could surprise investors — much like other pivotal moments during his tenure.】

item.title: 增长前景黯淡，捷克央行将再次降息
item.description: 随着国内通胀风险的减弱和对全球经济前景的担忧，捷克决策者可能会在第七次会议上降低利率，从而进一步放宽货币政策。【原文：Czech policymakers are likely to lower interest rates for a seventh meeting as receding domestic inflationary risks and concerns over the global economic outlook boost the case for further monetary easing.】

item.title: 大众汽车就德国工厂关闭问题与工会交锋
item.description: 本周三，大众汽车公司与工会开始就大范围的成本削减（包括可能的裁员）进行谈判，双方之间的紧张关系超过了多年来的水平。【原文：Volkswagen AG and unions start negotiations over wide-ranging cost cuts on Wednesday including possible worker retrenchment, with tensions between both sides higher than they’ve been in years.】

item.title: 韩国称若不改革养老基金将于 2056 年枯竭
item.description: 韩国政府表示，如果不采取包括提高缴费在内的紧急改革措施，韩国的国家养老基金（世界上最大的养老基金之一）将于 2056 年耗尽。【原文：South Korea’s national pension fund, one of the world’s biggest, will run out by 2056 if urgent reforms including boosting contributions aren’t introduced, the government said.】

item.title: 蔬菜价格飙升令中国家庭雪上加霜
item.description: 中国的政策制定者可能正在竭尽全力摆脱对亚洲最大经济体大部分地区造成的通货紧缩压力，但有一类产品却形成了鲜明对比：蔬菜。【原文：China’s policymakers may be doing their utmost to shake off deflationary pressures weighing on much of Asia’s largest economy, but there’s one category of products that stands out as a contrast: vegetables.】

item.title: 美国调查科技公司 SAP 和 Carahsoft 是否涉嫌操纵价格
item.description: 德国软件开发商 SAP SE、产品分销商 Carahsoft Technology Corp. 和其他公司正在接受美国官员的调查，原因是他们可能在十年间合谋向政府机构多收费用。【原文：German software developer SAP SE, product reseller Carahsoft Technology Corp. and other companies are being probed by US officials for potentially conspiring to overcharge government agencies over the course of a decade.】

item.title: 香港在世界金融中心排名中超越新加坡
item.description: 一项调查显示，香港蝉联亚洲顶级金融中心的宝座，将新加坡挤下亚洲第二的宝座。【原文：Hong Kong reclaimed its spot as Asia’s top financial center, knocking Singapore back to second place in the region, according to a survey.】

item.title: 科罗纳多在垃圾股市场出售罕见的煤矿美元债券
item.description: 澳大利亚科罗纳多全球资源公司（Coronado Global Resources Inc.【原文：A unit of Australia’s Coronado Global Resources Inc. sold a rare bond in the dollar market by a coal miner, joining only a few other issuers to do so this year.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商尼奥抨击美国和欧盟的关税 "不合理
item.description: Nio公司创始人William Li抨击欧盟和美国，称它们对电动汽车征收关税的举措不合理，并敦促它们与中国合作而不是对抗。【原文：Nio Inc. founder William Li hit out at the European Union and the US, saying their moves to level tariffs on electric cars are unreasonable and urged them to cooperate with, rather than fight, China.】

item.title: 酷玩乐队热潮将使印度音乐股票升温
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 离岸韩国债券交易激增，向纳入指数迈进
item.description: 8 月份，韩国债券的离岸交易猛增，这可能会使韩国离加入主要国际债务指数的目标更近一步。【原文：Offshore trades in South Korean bonds skyrocketed in August, potentially taking the country a step closer to its objective of joining a major international debt index.】

item.title: 中国市场欧元债券在刺激经济大潮中经受考验
item.description: 中国开始销售三年来首笔欧元债券，在这一周里，全球投资者都被中国为重振放缓的经济而采取的一系列措施所吸引。【原文：China began marketing its first euro-denominated bond in three years, in a week when global investors have been riveted by a string of steps by the nation to revive its slowing economy.】

item.title: 中国经济刺激乐观，铁矿石重回每吨 100 美元价位
item.description: 铁矿石连续第二天强劲反弹，原因是市场猜测中国大规模的经济刺激计划将有助于刺激需求。【原文：Iron ore rallied strongly for a second day on speculation that China’s mammoth stimulus package would help to bolster demand.】

item.title: 贝恩称，到 2027 年，人工智能市场规模将飙升至近 1 万亿美元
item.description: 贝恩公司（Bain & Co.【原文：The global market for AI-related products is ballooning and will hit as much as $990 billion in 2027, as the technology’s quick adoption disrupts companies and economies, Bain & Co. said.】

item.title: 股市大涨，中国国家队 ETF 资金流入增加
item.description: 周二，受到主权基金青睐的中国交易所交易基金资金流入回升，表明国家买盘可能在自2020年中期以来最大的在岸股市上涨中发挥了作用。【原文：Chinese exchange-traded funds favored by the sovereign fund saw inflows pick up on Tuesday, suggesting state buying might have played a role in the biggest onshore equity rally since mid-2020.】

item.title: 摩根大通称港股反弹可能受空头回补推动
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Short covering may have driven outsized gains in Hong Kong stocks on Tuesday after China’s central bank unveiled a broad package of monetary stimulus measures, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 中国股市因持续乐观的刺激政策而扩大涨幅
item.description: 由于投资者继续押注中国政府的最新刺激措施将有助于推动市场好转，中国股市周三延续涨势。【原文：Chinese stocks extended their gains on Wednesday as investors continued to bet that Beijing’s latest stimulus measures would help drive a turnaround in the market.】

item.title: 印尼借款人的印尼盾债务狂潮将放缓
item.description: 由于国内银行流动性不断减少，以及对美联储降息将吸引借款人重返美元市场的预期不断增强，印尼的本币贷款增长正面临着潜在的放缓。【原文：Indonesia’s local currency loan growth is facing a potential slowdown amid dwindling domestic bank liquidity and growing expectations that the Federal Reserve’s rate cuts will lure borrowers back into the dollar market.】

item.title: 百年灵首席执行官 "非常确信 "奢侈品行业已触底
item.description: 百年灵公司首席执行官乔治-柯恩（Georges Kern）表示，他 "非常有信心 "奢侈品行业已经触底，因为以中国为首的经济放缓给全球高端零售商造成了损失。【原文：Breitling AG’s Chief Executive Officer Georges Kern said he’s “quite confident” the luxury industry has hit bottom, amid a China-led economic slowdown that’s taken a toll on high-end retailers around the world.】

item.title: 泰铢升至 2022 年 3 月以来最强，出口商忧心忡忡
item.description: 在强劲的投资组合流入和美元普遍疲软的情况下，泰铢升至 30 个月来的最强水平，这加剧了泰国出口商的困境。【原文：The baht gained to its strongest level in 30 months amid robust portfolio inflows and broad dollar weakness, adding to exporters’ woes in Thailand.】

item.title: 香港计划削减烈酒税以振兴夜生活
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港正计划降低对烈酒征收的税额，因为这个亚洲金融中心正努力恢复其作为夜生活、餐饮和购物首选地的优势。【原文：Hong Kong is planning to lower the amount of tax it levies on spirits, according to people familiar with the matter, as the Asian financial center seeks to regain its edge as a premier destination for nightlife, dining and shopping.】

item.title: 美国数据支持更大幅度降息，黄金维持在历史高位附近
item.description: 由于疲软的美国数据增强了更大幅度降息的理由，黄金在前一交易日跳涨逾 1%后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied after jumping more than 1% in the previous session as weak US data bolstered the case for deeper rate cuts.】

item.title: 新加坡企业北上上市，马来西亚备受瞩目
item.description: 由于新加坡今年的新股上市量将是四分之一世纪以来最差的一年，该市的一些公司正寻求在马来西亚蓬勃发展的市场上出售股票。【原文：With Singapore on track for its worst year for new stock listings in a quarter century, some of the city-state’s companies are looking to possibly sell shares in Malaysia’s booming market.】

item.title: 芯片股下滑，日本 Kioxia 公司推迟上市计划
item.description: 在半导体股低迷之后，日本内存芯片制造商 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 将首次公开募股计划推迟到今年晚些时候。【原文：Japanese memory chipmaker Kioxia Holdings Corp. is pushing back plans for an initial public offering until later this year after a downturn in semiconductor stocks.】

item.title: 人民币汇率自 2023 年 5 月以来首次突破 1 美元兑 7 元人民币
item.description: 随着投资者消化了一系列支持中国经济的措施，以及美联储最近的降息令美元持续走低，人民币在 16 个月内首次突破 7 美元兑 1 美元的里程碑。【原文：The yuan rallied past the 7 per dollar milestone for the first time in 16 months as investors digested a raft of measures to support the Chinese economy and the recent Federal Reserve rate cut kept the dollar on the back-foot.】
